trans-unit.source: Provides basic functionality for controls that display a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" />, or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Fornece funcionalidades básicas para controles que exibem um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> quando um controle de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton" /> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> is the abstract base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, which can host items directly or host additional items in a drop-down container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> é a classe base abstrata para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, que pode hospedar itens diretamente ou itens de host adicionais em um contêiner de lista suspensa.

trans-unit.source: You do this by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode fazer isso definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> propriedade para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> e configuração o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.

trans-unit.source: Access these drop-down items directly through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Acessar esses itens de lista suspensa diretamente por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to show and hide <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como mostrar e ocultar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> controles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" />.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar de um controle de lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> classe para ter qualquer funcionalidade do menu suspenso para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" />.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar de um controle de lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> classe para ter qualquer funcionalidade do menu suspenso para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create and initialize <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> controls.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como criar e inicializar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> controles.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> classe.

trans-unit.source: The display text of the drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: O texto de exibição do controle suspenso.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: The action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: A ação a ser tomada quando o controle suspenso recebe um clique.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> class with the specified display text, image, and action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> com o texto de exibição e a imagem especificadas e a ação a ser tomada quando o controle suspenso receber um clique.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar de um controle de lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> classe para ter qualquer funcionalidade do menu suspenso para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> controle.

trans-unit.source: The display text of the drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: O texto de exibição do controle suspenso.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> collection that the drop-down control contains.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> contida pelo controle suspenso.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> class with the specified display text, image, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> collection that the drop-down control contains.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> com o texto de exibição especificado, a imagem e a coleção <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> contida pelo controle suspenso.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: Você deve derivar de um controle de lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> classe para ter qualquer funcionalidade do menu suspenso para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> controle.

trans-unit.source: The display text of the drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: O texto de exibição do controle suspenso.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no controle.

trans-unit.source: The action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: A ação a ser tomada quando o controle suspenso recebe um clique.

trans-unit.source: The name of the control.
trans-unit.target: O nome do controle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> class with the specified display text, image, action to take when the drop-down control is clicked, and control name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> com o texto de exibição, a imagem e o nome do controle especificados e a ação a ser tomada quando o controle suspenso receber um clique.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a generic <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> for which events can be defined.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> genérico para o qual os eventos podem ser definidos.

trans-unit.source: The created <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> criado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> method is automatically called if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property finds no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> método é chamado automaticamente se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> propriedade localiza não <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> associado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose()` e pelo método <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> cuidado para não fazer referência a objetos que têm foi descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para <see langword="Dispose" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como implementar <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <see langword="Dispose" /> e <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> that will be displayed when this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> que será exibido ao clicar neste <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" />.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>, a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> creates a generic drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> está associado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>, uma chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> cria um controle suspenso genérico.

trans-unit.source: If a drop-down control is automatically generated, which means that items are added to the collection, and you then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property to an explicit drop-down control, you might lose data.
trans-unit.target: Se um controle de lista suspensa é gerado automaticamente, que significa que os itens são adicionados à coleção, e, em seguida, definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> propriedade a um controle de lista suspensa explícita, você poderá perder dados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to assign a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> control to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como atribuir um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> o controle para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> do controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> closes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> é fechado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the direction in which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> emerges from its parent container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a direção na qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> surge de seu contêiner pai.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection" />.

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade é definida com um valor que não é um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItemClicked> eventos para vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> controles.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of items in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de itens no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> associada a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> of controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> de controles.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> property to get all the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> that is referred to by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> propriedade para obter todos os itens na <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> que é referenciado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> property to create a menu with sub-menus.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> propriedade para criar um menu com submenus.

trans-unit.source: For the complete code example, see [How to: Display Option Buttons in a MenuStrip](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-option-buttons-in-a-menustrip-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: Para o exemplo de código completo, consulte [como: exibir botões de opção em um MenuStrip](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-option-buttons-in-a-menustrip-windows-forms.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the screen coordinates, in pixels, of the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as coordenadas da tela, em pixels, do canto superior esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Point" /> representing the x and y screen coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Point" /> que representa a x e y coordenadas em pixels da tela.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> has opened.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> é aberto.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks the drop down item or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando o usuário clica suspensa item ou quando você chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to dynamically populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse evento para preencher dinamicamente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como tratar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownOpened> eventos para vários <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> controles.

trans-unit.source: Occurs as the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> is opening.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre enquanto o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> é aberto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownOpening> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownOpening> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância de um tipo que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>.

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripDropDownItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownOpening> event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, nomear a instância `ToolStripDropDownItem1` e certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownOpening> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> has been created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> foi criado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> has been created otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> foi criado caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> has <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> controls associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> tem controles <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> associados a ele.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> has <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> tem <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> controla; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to query the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.HasDropDownItems%2A> property to conditionally show a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como consultar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.HasDropDownItems%2A> para mostrar condicionalmente um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> controle.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> classe.

trans-unit.source: Makes a visible <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> hidden.
trans-unit.target: Torna um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> visível oculto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.HideDropDown%2A> method to prevent the user from choosing one of the options available on the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> control.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.HideDropDown%2A> método para impedir que o usuário escolher uma das opções disponíveis em associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to hide a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> control when a button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como ocultar uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> controlar quando um botão é pressionado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Bounds" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Bounds" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownClosed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownClosed" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.OnDropDownClosed%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.OnDropDownClosed%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.OnDropDownClosed(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.OnDropDownClosed(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.OnDropDownClosed(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.OnDropDownClosed(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> is in the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> está no estado pressionado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> is in the pressed state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> está no pressionado estado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passado por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> que representa a chave a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem para manipular as teclas de comando.

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: As chaves de comando são chaves que sempre têm precedência sobre as chaves de entrada regulares.

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: Aceleradores e atalhos do menu são exemplos de teclas de comando.

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: O método deve retornar `true` para indicar que ele processou a chave de comando, ou `false` para indicar que a chave não é uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> implementation of this method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> if there are items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> implementação deste método chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> se houver itens no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation calls the base class implementation.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, essa implementação chama a implementação da classe base.

trans-unit.source: for the immediate caller and inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: para o chamador imediato e herança de classes chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ProcessCmdKey(System.Windows.Forms.Message@,System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method in a derived class, the method override should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ProcessCmdKey(System.Windows.Forms.Message@,System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> método em uma classe derivada, a substituição de método deve retornar <see langword="true" /> para indicar que ele processou a chave.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas raramente, ou nunca, precisará substituir este método.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> que representa a chave a ser processada.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a chave foi processada pelo item; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, ENTER, and SPACEBAR keys in order to navigate the hierarchy of drop-down menus.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem para tratar de cima para baixo, para a esquerda, direita, ENTER e barra de espaços de chaves para navegar na hierarquia de menus suspensos.

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: para todas as janelas de herança de classes para chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see langword="AllWindows" /> valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method in a derived class, the overriding implementation should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir o <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> método em uma classe derivada, a implementação de substituição deve retornar <see langword="true" /> para indicar que ele processou a chave.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas raramente, ou nunca, precisará substituir este método.

trans-unit.source: Displays the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> control associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" />.
trans-unit.target: Exibe o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown%2A> method to display the drop-down controls that have been set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown%2A> método para exibir os controles de lista suspensa que foram definidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to show a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> control when a button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como exibir um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> controlar quando um botão é pressionado.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> is the same as the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem" /> é o mesmo que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> pai.
